game.title: Treasure Hunt
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of Captain Jack.
game.description: Captain Jack's treasure is said to be hidden on a remote island. Find the treasure and bring it back to me.

task.objective: Find the map to the island.
task.description: The map to the island is said to be hidden in the old church.
Once you have the map, you can use it to find the island.
The treasure is said to be hidden in a cave on the island.
Once you have found the treasure, return it to Blackbeard.
